column2: Between an arrival andsubsequent departure in theopposite direction

Priority should be given to platforming all services on Platform 2. When services are crossing or there areotherwise two services planned in the station simultaneously preference should be given to platforming Voyagersand Class 80x services to/from London on Platform 2.
